B C G I M N P R S T U 

B

BoardModel - Class in <Unnamed>
The BoardModel class contains all the data used by the Mancala game.
BoardModel() - Constructor for class BoardModel
Constructs BoardModel by initializing arrays for storing pit data and view ChangeListeners, a HashMap for storing opposite pit paris, an array of undos remaing for each player, an int storing the current player, and flags used to determine if an undo is appropriate.
BoardPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
Defines the layout of the mancala game board.
BoardPanel(BoardModel) - Constructor for class BoardPanel
Constructs BoardPanel with a BorderLayout and fits a game board formatted as a GridLayout into the center.
BoardView - Class in <Unnamed>
Creates the mancala game's main window and buttons for determining the stylization of the game board.
BoardView(BoardModel) - Constructor for class BoardView
Constructs the JFrame enclosing the mancala game board and creates JButtons for the different game parameters.

C

checkIfGameOver() - Method in class BoardModel
Sums up both players' pit counts independently to determine if the game is finished -- moves the remaining stones on the other player's side to their mancala if so.
createMancala() - Method in class GreenStrategy
Creates a mancala shape to be displayed on the mancala board.
createMancala() - Method in class RedStrategy
Creates a mancala shape to be displayed on the mancala board.
createMancala() - Method in interface StyleStrategy
 
createPit() - Method in class GreenStrategy
Creates a pit shape to be displayed on the mancala board.
createPit() - Method in class RedStrategy
Creates a pit shape to be displayed on the mancala board.
createPit() - Method in interface StyleStrategy
 

G

getColor() - Method in class GreenStrategy
Returns the color that this strategy specialized in.
getColor() - Method in class RedStrategy
Returns the color that this strategy specialized in.
getColor() - Method in interface StyleStrategy
 
getCurrentPlayer() - Method in class BoardModel
Yields the current player.
getPits() - Method in class BoardModel
Yields an array of ints representing the stone count in each pit.
getPits() - Method in class BoardPanel
Yields an ArrayList of pits.
getPreferredSize() - Method in class Pit
Yields the preferred size of this JComponent.
GreenStrategy - Class in <Unnamed>
Implements StyleStrategy interface's required methods in accordance with the strategy pattern.
GreenStrategy() - Constructor for class GreenStrategy
 

I

initializeBoard(StyleStrategy) - Method in class BoardPanel
Creates pits for both mancalas and all 12 actual pits while attaching MouseListeners to those 12 pits.
initializePits(int) - Method in class BoardModel
Initialized the array of ints that represent the stone count in each pit.
initOpposites() - Method in class BoardModel
Initialized the HashMap used to find opposite pit pairs.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class MancalaTest
 
MancalaTest - Class in <Unnamed>
 
MancalaTest() - Constructor for class MancalaTest
 

N

notifyViews() - Method in class BoardModel
Triggers the stateChanged action for the views' ChangeListener.

P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class Pit
Paints this JComponent and draws stones inside of it.
Pit - Class in <Unnamed>
The Pit class is a JComponent that is displayed on the mancala game board.
Pit(StyleStrategy, boolean) - Constructor for class Pit
Constructs a Pit object.

R

RedStrategy - Class in <Unnamed>
Implements StyleStrategy interface's required methods in accordance with the strategy pattern.
RedStrategy() - Constructor for class RedStrategy
 
registerView(ChangeListener) - Method in class BoardModel
Attaches a view's ChangeListener to the model.

S

setStoneCount(int) - Method in class Pit
Sets the number of stones to be drawn in this pit.
stateChanged(ChangeEvent) - Method in class BoardView
Listens for stateChanged notifications from the BoardModel.
StyleStrategy - Interface in <Unnamed>
Interface that defines methods that classes must implement in accordance with the strategy pattern.

T

takeTurn(int) - Method in class BoardModel
Performs Mancala game's logic to complete a turn.

U

undo() - Method in class BoardModel
Determines if it is appropraite for an undo action to take place.
